src:
Niko nikad kao Luka Dončić! Da mu pozavide Vilt, Medžik, Oskar, Kid... (VIDEO)
Boban Marjanović umalo do dabl-dabla! Košmarno veče Rasela Vestbruka i minus od 46 poena na +/- skali i katastrofa Hjustona u Majamiju

04 Nov 2019


Otkako se pojavio na velikoj sceni kao golobradi klinac i svoju profesionalnu karijeru započeo trojkom iz prvog šuta u dresu madridskog Reala, Luka Dončić prošao je strahovit put do zvezda. U Evropi je uzeo sve što se osvojiti može, kao najbolji u svemu otišao je u NBA i postavio standarde koje teško da će neko dostići u skorije vreme! Toliko je epiteta zaslužio Luka Dončić, ali nam je i pored svega ponestalo reči da bismo opisali njegovu genijalnost na parketu. Valjda će najbolju potvrdu kvaliteta dobiti onog trenutka kada svi koji su mu predviđali krah karijere po odlasku preko okeana budu priznali da su pogrešili i da Luka Dončić zaista jeste jedinstven!

Odakle da počnemo... Luka Dončić je prošle noći postao tek prvi igrač posle 35 godina i neponovljivog Oskara Robertsona kome je od ruke pošlo da veže dva tripl-dabla sa bar 25 poena, 15 asistencija i 10 skokova i najmlađi u istoriji košarke s uzastopnim mečevima gde je beležio tripl-dablove s bar 25 poena! Da bismo vam približili koliki je to uspeh, napisaćemo da će Luka Dončić 28. februara naredne godine tek napuniti 21 godinu! Ovo je njegov jedanaesti tripl-dabl NBA karijere u 78 odigranih utakmica, što je rekord za igrače mlađe od 21 godine. Donedavno je na vrhu bio Medžik Džonson sa sedam partija u kojima je imao dvocifren učinak u tri glavne statističke kategorije. Drugi je igrač u istoriji Dalasa posle Džejsona Kida s uzastopnim mečevima u kojima je podelio bar 15 asistencija! Prvi je igrač u istoriji NBA koji je vezao partije s bar 29 poena, 15 asistencija i 13 skokova. Ovo je njegov sedmi tripl-dabl s 25 poena, čime je pretekao Kida u tom aspektu! Samo su Vilt Čembrlejn, Medžik Džonson i Oskar Robertson imali višestrukih 29-15-13 tripl-dablova pre nego što im se Dončić pridružio...



Lista individualnih uspeha proteže se u nedogled i Dončić neprestano koriguje istorijske knjige, zbog čega više nema dileme da će u februaru zaslužiti i status All-Star igrača! Posle šoua koji je zajedno s Lebronom Džejmsom priredio pre nekoliko dana, Luka Dončić pokazuje celom svetu da će uskoro postati i MVP najjače lige sveta, a zašto ne i šampion u dogledno vreme?! 
Dalas je kao gost pregazio Klivlend sa 131:111, a naravno Dončić je bio apsolutno najbolji igrač utakmice! Pribeležio je 29 poena (9/17 iz igre, 5/10 za tri), 15 asistencija i 14 skokova, za 33 minuta. Odličnu rolu imao je i Boban Marjanović koji je definitivno ostvario odličnu saradnju s slovenačkom superzvezdom. Bobi je za 15 minuta na parketu umalo skupio dab-dabl, ali je na kraju ostao na 12 poena i osam skokova. Kristaps Porzingis je meč završio sa 18 poena i devet skokova, dok je Set Kari imao 13 poena. U redovima Klivlenda ispred svih bio je Kevin Lav sa 29 poena i osam skokova. Tristan Tompson je ubeležio 11 poena i jedan skok više, dok su Džedi Osman i Kolin Sekston ubacili po 10 poena.



Dok Dalas proživljava renesansu i planira samo najlepše stvari, Hjuston se raspada! Rakete su još jednom poražene na strani, a posle Bruklina bolji je bio Majami sa 129:100. Ponovo su u fokusu javnosti bili dvojica najboljih igrača Hjustona – Džejms Harden i Rasel Vestbruk. Bradonja jeste imao 29 poena (6/14 iz igre), ali je ponovo veliku porciju koševa ubacio s linije penala (14/14). S druge strane Vestbruk je imao košmarno veče, koje se poklopilo s katastrofom celog tima! Imao je svega 10 poena (3/11 iz igre) za 26 minuta, ali je na +/- skali imao minus od 46 poena! Majami je vodio od prvog, do poslednjeg minuta, a dovoljno je da napišemo da je rezultat nakon uvodnih 12 minuta bio, pazite sada – 46:14! Sredinom drugog kvartala Majami je vodio i sa 41 poenom razlike (59:18), a distanca se nijednog trenutka nije spuštala ispod 25 poena! U poslednjoj deonici ponovo je bilo 40 poena, ali je na kraju Hjuston, bar rezultatski, izbegao pravu blamažu...



Lejkersi su bili bolji u San Antoniju rezultatom 103:96, a najbolji kod gostiju bili su Lebron Džejms i Entoni Dejvis. Kralj je ubeležio novi tripl-dabl s 21 poenom, 13 asistencija i 11 skokova, dok ga je Obrva skupio dabl-dabl sa 25 poena i 11 uhvaćenih lopti. Kod Sparsa Dežonte Mari imao je 18 poena i takođe 11 skokova.



Klipersi su na svom terenu nadigrali Jutu s 105:94, a do pobede ekipu je vodio Kavaj Lenard s 30 poena, šest skokova i tri asistencije. Montrezl Herel ga je ispratio s 19 poena i osam uhvaćenih lopti. Kod gostiju Donovan Mičel imao je 36 poena.




NBA – rezultati

Indijana – Čikago 108:95/Voren 26 – Levin 21/
Majami – Hjuston 129:100/Robinson 23 – Harden 29/
Njujork – Sakramento 92:113/Moris 28 – Foks 24/
San Antonio – LA Lejkers 96:103/Mari 18 – Dejvis 25/
Klivlend – Dalas 111:131/Lav 29 – Dončić 29/
LA Klipers – Juta 105:94/Leonard 30 – Mičel 36/

ZAPADNA KONFERENCIJA




Foto: Reuters
text:
No one ever like Luka Doncic! To Wilt, Wilt, Magic, Oscar, Kid ... (VIDEO)
Boban Marjanovic Almost To Double-Double! Russell Westbrook's Nightmare Evening + minus 46 points on the +/- scale and the Houston disaster in Miami

04 Nov 2019


Ever since he appeared on the big stage as a naked kid and started his professional career with a threesome from the first shot in a Real Madrid jersey, Luka Doncic has gone the dreaded path to the stars. In Europe, he took everything he could to win, as the best of all he went to the NBA and set standards that hardly anyone can reach any time soon! Luka Dončić deserved so many epithets, but we still ran out of words to describe his ingenuity on the floor. I guess he will get the best confirmation of the quality when everyone who predicted his career collapse after leaving the ocean admits that they were wrong and that Luka Dončić really is unique!

Where to start ... Last night, Luka Doncic became just the first player after 35 years and the inimitable Oscar Robertson to tie two triple-doubles with at least 25 points, 15 assists and 10 rebounds and the youngest in consecutive basketball history matches where he recorded triple-doubles with at least 25 points! To bring you closer to success, we will write that on February 28 next year Luka Doncic will only turn 21! This is his eleventh triple-double of his NBA career in 78 games played, a record for players under 21. Until recently, top ten was Magic Johnson with seven parties in which he had double-digit performance in the three major statistical categories. He is the second player in the history of Dallas after Jason Kidd to win at least 15 assists! He is the first player in NBA history to tie the game with at least 29 points, 15 assists and 13 rebounds. This is his seventh triple-double with 25 points, overtaking the Kid in that aspect! Only Wilt Chamberlain, Magic Johnson and Oscar Robertson had multiple 29-15-13 triple-doubles before Doncic joined them ...



The list of individual successes extends indefinitely, and Doncic continually corrects history books, which is why he no longer has the dilemma that he will earn All-Star player status in February! After a show hosted by Lebron James a few days ago, Luka Doncic shows to the world that he will soon become the MVP of the strongest league in the world, and why not a champion in the near future ?!
Dallas beat Cleveland 131-111 as a guest, and of course Doncic was the absolute best player of the game! He tallied 29 points (9/17 from the game, 5/10 for three), 15 assists and 14 rebounds in 33 minutes. Boban Marjanovic also had an excellent role and he definitely made a great collaboration with the Slovenian superstar. Bobby nearly collected a double-double in the 15 minutes on the floor, but ended up staying 12 points and eight rebounds. Kristaps Porzingis finished the match with 18 points and nine rebounds, while Set Kari had 13 points. In the Cleveland ranks ahead of everyone was Kevin Lav with 29 points and eight rebounds. Tristan Thompson notched 11 points and one rebound, while Jedi Osman and Colin Sexton each scored 10 points.



While Dallas is experiencing a renaissance and planning only the most beautiful things, Houston is falling apart! The Rockets were once again defeated on the sidelines, and after Brooklyn, Miami was better with 129: 100. Again, two of Houston's best players - James Harden and Russell Westbrook - were in the public eye. Bradonja did have 29 points (6/14 from the game), but again he threw a large portion of points off the penalty line (14/14). Westbrook, on the other hand, had a nightmarish night that coincided with the disaster of the whole team! He only had 10 points (3/11 from the game) in 26 minutes, but he had a minus 46 points on the +/- scale! Miami led from the first to the last minute, and suffice it to say that the result after the opening 12 minutes was, watch out now - 46:14! In the middle of the second quarter Miami also led with 41 points difference (59:18), and the distance never dropped below 25 points! In the last section it was again 40 points, but in the end Houston, at least in result, avoided the real clamor ...



The Lakers were better in San Antonio with a score of 103: 96 and the best of the guests were Lebron James and Anthony Davis. King recorded a new triple-double with 21 points, 13 assists and 11 rebounds, while Eyebrow collected a double-double with 25 points and 11 balls. With Spars, Deonte Marie had 18 points and also 11 rebounds.



The Clippers outscored Utah with 105-94 at home, and were led by Kavaj Lenard with 30 points, six rebounds and three assists. Montrezl Herel escorted him with 19 points and eight caught balls. Donovan Mitchell had 36 points.




NBA - Results

Indiana - Chicago 108: 95 / Warren 26 - Levin 21 /
Miami - Houston 129: 100 / Robinson 23 - Harden 29 /
New York - Sacramento 92: 113 / Morris 28 - Fox 24 /
San Antonio - LA Lakers 96: 103 / Mar 18 - Davis 25 /
Cleveland - Dallas 111: 131 / Leo 29 - Doncic 29 /
LA Clippers - Utah 105: 94 / Leonard 30 - Mitchell 36 /
